logicalTable.name: Time Facts
logicalTable.description:
This logical table maps to the physical Time Dimension tables at Day and Month grains. It maps to 4 physical table objects.
A07 Time Day and A08 Time Mth have the calendar hierarchy defined on them.
A10 Fiscal Time Day has the Fiscal hierarchy defined on it.
B08 Time Mth maps to the Forecast fact table.

logicalColumns.name: T00 Calendar Date
logicalColumns.description:
Help : 
Stores the date information in the format YYYY-MM-DD. Eg :- 2005-11-01

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Sample App Data.BISAMPLE.D01 Time Day Grain.Calendar_Date

logicalColumns.name: T6 ------------------------------------------
logicalColumns.description:
Help :
Header object, dummy not to be used in any queries

logicalColumns.name: T24  First Day Dt in Period
logicalColumns.description:
Help : 
Stores the date information in the format YYYY-MM-DD. Eg :- 2005-11-01

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Sample App Data.BISAMPLE.D01 Time Day Grain.Calendar_Date

logicalColumns.name: T25  Last Day Dt in Period
logicalColumns.description:
Help : 
Stores the date information in the format YYYY-MM-DD. Eg :- 2005-11-01

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Sample App Data.BISAMPLE.D01 Time Day Grain.Calendar_Date

logicalColumns.name: T62  # of Days
logicalColumns.description:
Help : 
Period Name Week. Stores the week information in the format YYYY Week Number. Eg :- 2005 Week 44

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CAST ( TIMESTAMPDIFF( SQL_TSI_DAY , %1, %2) AS DOUBLE PRECISION ) + 1
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Sample App.Time Facts.T24  First Day Dt in Period
logicalColumn:Sample App.Time Facts.T25  Last Day Dt in Period

logicalColumns.name: T63  # of Weeks
logicalColumns.description:
Help : 
Shows the number of weeks within the period chosen.

logicalColumns.name: T64  # of Months
logicalColumns.description:
Help : 
Shows the number of months within the period chosen.

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Sample App.Time Facts.T67 Avg Days in Mth

aggregateByLevels: logicalLevel:Sample App.Offices and Channels (M:M Joins).Off and Chnl Total
logicalLevel:Sample App.Products (Ragged SkipLevels Hier).Product (Rgd Sk Lvl) Total
logicalLevel:Sample App.Sales Rep (Parent Child Hier).Sales Reps Total

logicalColumns.name: T65  # of Qtrs
logicalColumns.description:
Help : 
Shows the number of quarters within the period chosen.

logicalColumns.name: T66  # of Years
logicalColumns.description:
Help : 
Shows the number of years within the period chosen.

logicalColumns.name: T67 Avg Days in Mth
logicalColumns.description:
Help : 
Days in Mth stores the number of days in that month. It could either be 30,31,28 or 29.

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Sample App Data.BISAMPLE.D01 Time Day Grain.Days_in_Mth
physicalColumn:Sample App Data.BISAMPLE.D02 Time Month Grain.Days_in_Mth

tables: physicalTable:Sample App Data.BISAMPLE.D01 Time Day Grain
physicalTable:Sample App Data.BISAMPLE.D02 Time Month Grain
